meanings.definition: A game in which metal balls are thrown towards a target ball.
meanings.sent1: During the picnic, we enjoyed a friendly game of petanque in the park.
meanings.sent2: The local club organizes regular petanque tournaments for the community.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa's petanque skills are so sharp, he always wins against us!
meanings.sent4: The clinking sound of metal balls in petanque echoes through the quiet afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The rules of petanque are simple: aim your ball closest to the target to win.

meanings.definition: To play the game of petanque.
meanings.sent1: We plan to petanque this weekend at the beach with our friends.
meanings.sent2: She loves to petanque with her siblings whenever they visit the countryside.
meanings.sent3: Let's petanque our way to victory in the family tournament!
meanings.sent4: The friends decided to petanque their stress away after a long day at work.
meanings.sent5: Petanquing under the stars adds a magical touch to our summer evenings.
